interestingcomments.content: fuji cam remote any better with bluetooth? /!/ Have been using the app (and Cascable) over wifi on the x100f, and it's generally horrendous. Especially connectivity, and being able to quickly connect via. For anyone on the x-e3, is the bluetooth performance any better?
